summary: The module centralizes legacy configuration handling for the Mission Support System UI prior to version 8.0.0. It defines default UI settings such as map projections, interpolation methods, service endpoints, and waypoint presets, and offers utilities to read, write, merge, and modify configuration files and Qt settings, facilitating migration of older configuration formats to the current system.
business_intent: Enable seamless upgrade of user configurations from preâ€‘8.0 releases by providing default values and conversion utilities, thereby preserving user preferences and ensuring the UI operates correctly after software updates.
